content: परित्यज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To leave, quit, abandon. {@--2@} To resign, give up, discard, renounce; प्रारब्धमुत्तमगुणा न परित्यजंति <ls>Mu. 2. 17.</ls> {@--3@} To except; तृणमप्यपरित्यज्य सतृणं <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--4@} To leave over, leave as a remainder. {@--5@} To neglect, disregard. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To deprive a person of, rob any one of.
